meanings.definition: Extend jointly in the same direction.
meanings.sent1: The two friends coextend their arms to reach the high shelf.
meanings.sent2: The siblings coextend the rope to create a bridge across the stream.
meanings.sent3: The dancers coextend their legs in perfect sync, creating a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the trees coextend towards the sky, forming a natural canopy.
meanings.sent5: The athletes coextend their efforts to achieve victory in the relay race.

meanings.definition: To extend or stretch out together.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillars coextend their bodies as they crawl along the branch.
meanings.sent2: The workers coextend the fabric to ensure it covers the entire table.
meanings.sent3: The students coextend their study time to prepare for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent4: The vines coextend across the garden, creating a lush green carpet.
meanings.sent5: The team members coextend their arms to lift the heavy equipment together.

meanings.definition: To share the same boundaries or limits.
meanings.sent1: The two countries coextend their borders along the river.
meanings.sent2: The properties coextend at the back, sharing a common fence.
meanings.sent3: The neighborhoods coextend, making it easy for residents to visit each other.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the rainbow coextend in a beautiful arc across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ideas in the book coextend with the concepts discussed in class.
